    • Constructor Detail

      • ScimResource

        public ScimResource​(SchemaManager schemaManager,
                    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode resourceNode,
                    java.lang.String container)
             throws SchemaException,
                    java.text.ParseException,
                    ScimException
        Construct the resource based on JsonNode
        Parameters:
        schemaManager - The SchemaManager object holding SCIM shema definitions
        resourceNode - The JsonNode representation of a SCIM resource to be parsed
        container - The top level path element (e.g. Users).
        Throws:
        SchemaException - Thrown when object parsed violates SCIM Schema
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown when a JSON parsing error occurs
        ScimException - Thrown due to internal SCIM error (TBD)

      • ScimResource

        public ScimResource​(SchemaManager smgr)

      • ScimResource

        public ScimResource​(SchemaManager schemaManager,
                    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode resourceNode,
                    IBulkIdResolver bulkIdResolver,
                    java.lang.String container)
             throws SchemaException,
                    java.text.ParseException,
                    ScimException
        Creates a ScimResource based on a JsonNode structure
        Parameters:
        schemaManager - The server SchemaManager instance container server schema
        resourceNode - A JsonNode object containing a SCIM JSON parsed object
        bulkIdResolver - An IBulkIdResolver used to resolve identifiers during bulk operations
        container - A String identifying the resource container where the object is from or to be stored (e.g. Users, Groups). Used to lookup ResourceType and Schema
        Throws:
        SchemaException - Thrown when object parsed violates SCIM Schema
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown when a JSON parsing error occurs
        ScimException - Thrown due to internal SCIM error (TBD)

        Returns a JSON node representation of the resource. Can be used in copying and other transformations.
        Parameters:
        requestCtx - IF provided, will cause request filtering to be provided based on the request context.
        Returns:
        A JsonNode representation of the SCIM resource.

      • calcVersionHash

        public java.lang.String calcVersionHash()
                                 throws ScimException
        Calculate the MD5 digest hash of the resource based on its JSON representation.
        Returns:
        An String usable as an ETag for versioning/matching purposes
        Throws:
        ScimException - Thrown when error occurs when serializing resource for hash generation.

      • getValue

        public Value getValue​(Attribute attr)
        Return a value based on the attribute definition (which includes the attributes name, path, and schema). This procedure automatically checks core and extended attributes to locate the correct value.
        Parameters:
        attr - An attribute (e.g. from Schemas) definition
        Returns:
        A Value representing the corresponding attribute value if defined (or null).

      • modifyResource

        public void modifyResource​(JsonPatchRequest req,
                           RequestCtx ctx)
                    throws ScimException
        Description copied from interface: IResourceModifier
        Accepts a SCIM Patch request (similar to JSON Patch) and processes against the current ScimResource. If all operations succeed, the current scim object is modified (but not yet persisted) and true is returned. Processing is subject to attribute field mutability.
        Specified by:
        modifyResource in interface IResourceModifier
        Parameters:
        req - A JsonPatchRequest object containing the SCIM Patch request to be performed
        ctx - The RequestCtx providing SCIM request parameters and headers
        Throws:
        ScimException - general processing error such as precondition etc.
        SchemaException - occurs when a violation of scim schema occurs

      • replaceResAttributes

        public boolean replaceResAttributes​(ScimResource res,
                                    RequestCtx ctx)
        Description copied from interface: IResourceModifier
        Attempts to replace the current resource (subject to attribute mutability) with the specified parsed resource object. Non-mutable fields are left untouched.
        Specified by:
        replaceResAttributes in interface IResourceModifier
        Parameters:
        res - A parsed ScimResource from the inbound SCIM request to potentially replace the current object
        ctx - The RequestCtx (SCIM params and headers)
        Returns:
        True if the inbound ScimResource was used to replace the current resource.

      • isModified

        public boolean isModified()
        Specified by:
        isModified in interface IResourceModifier
        Returns:
        true if the resource has been modified and not yet persisted.

      • checkModPreConditionFail

        public boolean checkModPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
                                 throws PreconditionFailException
        Description copied from interface: IResourceModifier
        Checks the RequestCtx for If-Match and If-Unmodified-Since preconditions
        Specified by:
        checkModPreConditionFail in interface IResourceModifier
        Parameters:
        ctx - A RequestCtx containing the request headers
        Returns:
        true if preconditions fail
        Throws:
        PreconditionFailException - occurs if the precondition fails

      • checkGetPreConditionFail

        public boolean checkGetPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
                                 throws PreconditionFailException
        Description copied from interface: IResourceModifier
        Checks the RequestCtx for If-Not-Match and If-Modified-Since preconditions with the current resource for a match. If not matched, false is returned.
        Specified by:
        checkGetPreConditionFail in interface IResourceModifier
        Parameters:
        ctx - A RequestCtx containing the request headers
        Returns:
        true if preconditions fail
        Throws:
        PreconditionFailException - occurs if the precondition fails

        public boolean hasBulkIds()
        Specified by:
        hasBulkIds in interface IBulkIdTarget
        Returns:
        true if one of the attribute values in the resource has a bulkid: prefixed value that needs to be translated

        Specified by:
        getBulkIdsRequired in interface IBulkIdTarget
        Parameters:
        bulkList - A list provided by the caller which the target will update with any attributes that have a bulkId attribute that needs replacing.

      • copy

        public ScimResource copy​(RequestCtx requestCtx)
                  throws ScimException,
                         java.text.ParseException
        Copies the current ScimResource and returns a new ScimResource object. Include a RequestCtx to do attribute filtering.
        Parameters:
        requestCtx - A RequestCtx object which may be used to filter included/excluded attributes and security filtering.
        Returns:
        a New ScimResource based on a JsonNode copied result.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - Thrown when an invalid value is parsed compared to the defined attribute
        java.text.ParseException - Thrown due to JSON parsing error
        ScimException

      • getAttributesPresent

        public java.util.Set<Attribute> getAttributesPresent()
        This method often used by ACIs to evaluate whether the current resource attributes are authorized.
        Returns:
        A set of Attribute definitions that are present in the current resource. Includes core and extension attributes.

      • isAttributePresent

        public boolean isAttributePresent​(Attribute attr)
        Parameters:
        attr - The Attribute to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the resource contains the specified attribute.

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks that two separate ScimResource objects contain the same information.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to be compared (usually a ScimResource).
        Returns:
        true if the hashCode value for each resource is a match
